languages.text: "Не ринься Лорд-капитан сломя голову прерывать ритуал ксеносов, не пришлось бы никого спасать. Н-да... Эти двое друг друга стоят".
"If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."
languages.original_text: "Не ринься Лорд-капитан сломя голову прерывать ритуал ксеносов, не пришлось бы никого спасать. Н-да... Эти двое друг друга стоят".

traits.locale_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “要不是舰长大人发疯似的冲出去打断了异形的仪式，我们根本不必去救任何人。是啊……他们俩还真是天生一对。”
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: “要不是舰长大人发疯似的冲出去打断了异形的仪式，我们根本不必去救任何人。是啊……他们俩还真是天生一对。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Et si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne s'était pas {mf|précipité|précipitée} pour interrompre le rituel xénos, il n'y aurait eu besoin de sauver personne. Oui... Ces deux-là vont bien ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: « Et si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne s'était pas {mf|précipité|précipitée} pour interrompre le rituel xénos, il n'y aurait eu besoin de sauver personne. Oui... Ces deux-là vont bien ensemble. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no hubiera ido corriendo a interrumpir el ritual xenos, no habríamos tenido que salvar a nadie. Sí... se merecen la cruz que les ha caído».
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: «Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no hubiera ido corriendo a interrumpir el ritual xenos, no habríamos tenido que salvar a nadie. Sí... se merecen la cruz que les ha caído».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが異種族の儀式を中断させるために猛ダッシュで逃げなければ、誰も救う必要はなかった。ああ…あのふたりはお互い様よ」
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが異種族の儀式を中断させるために猛ダッシュで逃げなければ、誰も救う必要はなかった。ああ…あのふたりはお互い様よ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wäre der Lord Captain nicht wie von Sinnen losgespurtet, um das Xenos-Ritual zu unterbrechen, hätten wir gar niemanden retten müssen. Ja ... Die zwei haben einander verdient."
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre der Lord Captain nicht wie von Sinnen losgespurtet, um das Xenos-Ritual zu unterbrechen, hätten wir gar niemanden retten müssen. Ja ... Die zwei haben einander verdient."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan öyle fırlayıp zeno ayinini bozmaya kalkmasaydı kimseyi kurtarmaya da gerek kalmazdı. Ne diyeyim... Bulmuşlar birbirlerini."
languages.original_text: "If the Lord Captain hadn't made off in a mad dash to interrupt the xenos ritual, we wouldn't have had to save anyone. Yeah... Those two deserve each other."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan öyle fırlayıp zeno ritüelini bozmaya kalkmasaydı kimseyi kurtarmaya da gerek kalmazdı. Ne diyeyim... Bulmuşlar birbirlerini."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
